Title: Permits school board members who have served ten years to elect to receive state health insurance
Summary: Allows retired and current school board members who have served for ten years to receive state health insurance benefits.
LawCode: Amd ยง163, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to authorizing past or retired school board members to purchase state health insurance after ten years
